dialogue: Nicely handled {userName}!
Definitely! While all that was going on, I took another look at the missile's software - and I think I've found something..
What?
It's to do with the way the missile determines what is an obstacle, and what isn't. I think there may be a way to confuse it!
That is excellent news! What do we have to do?
We just need to arrange a few walls diagonally, with three walls in each diagonal row
Yeah... I don't follow..
Don't worry. Everyone, follow me outside
*you follow {4} outside, and he starts giving orders. Eventually, the walls are placed in the correct positions*
Are you sure this is going to work?
I am 50% confident that there is a 75% chance that this could work!
What? That doesn't make se-
*alarm sirens start blaring*
Only one way to find out! Everyone back inside!
*you all head back inside and look at the surveillance monitor*
I really hope this works, otherwise we won't have enough time to place a lot of walls
*the missile approaches the three walled rows, and carries on towards the base*
Is that supposed to happen?
{userName}, it's all up to you...
When is it not...
